member.name: _MFT_PROCESS_OUTPUT_FLAGS
member.summary: Defines flags for processing output samples in a Media Foundation transform (MFT).

member.name: _MFT_PROCESS_OUTPUT_FLAGS.MFT_PROCESS_OUTPUT_DISCARD_WHEN_NO_BUFFER
member.summary: Do not produce output for streams in which the pSample member of the structure is NULL. This flag is not valid unless the MFT has marked the output stream with the MFT_OUTPUT_STREAM_DISCARDABLE or MFT_OUTPUT_STREAM_LAZY_READ flag. For more information, see .

summary.para: Regenerates the last output sample. This flag is only used by video processing MFTs.
